document_data.name: Grand Council
document_data.mainbody: The '''Grand Council''' of [[Impiltur]] was a council of nobles that ruled the land from [[New Sarshel]] after the death of King [[Imbrar]]'s line during the [[Spellplague]]. It ruled through most of the 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Relationships: By the year {{yearlink|1479}}, they were vexed by a group of [[demon]]-worshipers known as the [[Fraternity of Tharos]].
document_data.Members:
The membership was drawn from the ranks of local nobles throughout [[Impiltur]];{{cite book/Forgotten Realms Player's Guide|106}} Many of its members resided in [[New Sarshel]]. One of its members in 1479 DR was Councilor [[Behroun Marhana]],{{cite book/City of Torment|19-21|3}} a year in which it was nascent. However, his claim to nobility was only because of his half-sister, [[Anusha Marhana]].{{cite book/Plague of Spells|34|3}}

As of 1479 DR, the family of [[Fasaria Laytharan]] sat on the council.{{cite dragon/366/Rose Keep|43}}
document_data.Rumors & Legends: By 1479 DR, the council was widely seen as quite inept.
